meanings.definition: Coesites: a high-pressure form of silica
meanings.sent1: Scientists study coesites to learn about high-pressure conditions.
meanings.sent2: Miners found coesites deep underground while searching for minerals.
meanings.sent3: The geologist joked that the coesites were playing hide and seek in the rocks.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, coesites shimmered like tiny diamonds under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The classroom display showcased coesites as rare gems formed under intense pressure.
